name: Standard JJ
description: An instructional video platform for students at a martial arts gym in Rockville, MD. The front end is built with React and the back end is built with express using firebase for user authentication and a database. The app content is exlusive to the gym's students, so I have prepared a demo video to show the app's basic functionality.

name: Curatr
description: An app for sharing curated lists of video games built using React, Express, and MongoDB. This was a week long group project where I took on the role of scrum master and lead front end dev (while also having a hand in the back end development). For this project I challenged myself to apply secure form validation on the front end before sending information to our back end, where I added further security using JSON web tokens and passport.js. Front and back ends hosted on Heroku.

name: SameVibe
description: A music discovery app for finding songs that sound similar to songs users already know they love using listening data from the Last.FM api. The api has lost a lot of it's original functionality which presented unique challenges that I was still able to work through. Hosted on Heroku

name: TV Trivia
description: A TV show trivia game made with pure Javascript and the Open Trivia Database api. Hosted on Github Pages

name: VolleyFall
description: A game made with the Godot engine. The idea came from combining mario, pong, and brick breaker! Unfortunately, the source code was lost and I was not able to complete the original game. There are two unfinished playable builds, one as a multiplayer only HTML build and one MacOS executable that includes the first version of a single player AI. I plan to re-build this game in a new engine and re-release it.

name: SpiraPlan Excel Integration
description: A Microsoft Excel Add-on that allows clients to log in to their SpiraTeam project management software account and import data from their projects into a spreadsheet, or export data from a spreadsheet to their projects. This was an internship project I completed for Inflectra, and they have continued building on top of it in the years since I started it.
